summary.body: Any thoughts on the trial of extra corridor lighting in Ben Jonson? I know the corridors are gloomy, but was there an urgent need to expend more electricity (albeit low carb) and why oh why is it ORANGE in a colour scheme of blue & white???? Rebecca is circulating a letter in the near future, so please, any one with colour sense, back me up!
summary.subject: Ben Jonson orange schmorange ...

summary.body: why are their two different lighting systems on the estate.  a nice white and a sordid orange on the podium area.  could we standardise on the white and get all of the white lights that are installed around the perimeter on the walls made to work.
summary.subject: lights on the estate
